description.en: For this challenge you will need a cup from your kit and any kind of potted plant in your room/house. Fill the cup and water the plant without wasting any of the liquid.

You mustn't spill the water out.
You have got 3 trials.

You managed to water the plant once but some of the water spilled out. = Good job! Let's try again.
You managed to water the plant twice but some of the water spilled out. = Excellent job! Another try?
You managed to water the plant three times and didn't waste any of the water. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
You managed to water the plant but some of the water spilled out. = 5 points
You managed to water the plant twice but some of the water spilled out. = 10 points
You managed to water the plant three times and didn't waste any of the water. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
